mod.name: PowerCharm
mod.description: An amulet that raises Attack. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

mod.name: PowerTalon
mod.description: A powerful amulet that raises Attack. Made with a Deviljho Talon.

mod.name: Demondrug
mod.description: Boosts your Attack by filling you with -- guess what? -- demonic strength.

mod.name: Mega Demondrug
mod.description: Boosts your Attack even more than a regular Demondrug.

mod.name: Might Seed
mod.description: Temporarily raises your Attack when ingested by improving energy flow.

mod.name: Might Pill
mod.description: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

mod.name: Exciteshroom (Mycology)
mod.description: Skills that allow consumption of mushrooms and grant certain benefits as a result.

mod.name: Demon Horn
mod.description: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used

mod.name: Demon S
mod.description: Said to bestow the strength of Asura on the target. Max 5 shots.

mod.name: Demon Affinity S
mod.description: Boosts ally's attack and affinity

mod.name: Cool Cat
mod.description: Activated when using Kick Back Gesture

mod.name: Felyne Booster
mod.description: Temporarily increase Attack and Defense at the start of a Quest.

mod.name: Attack Up (S)
mod.description: Slightly increase Attack.

mod.name: Attack Up (M)
mod.description: Increases Attack.

mod.name: Attack Up (L)
mod.description: Greatly increases Attack.

mod.name: Adrenaline +2
mod.description: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used

mod.name: Felyne Heroics
mod.description: Greatly increases attack when health is very low.

mod.name: Fortify 1
mod.description: Increases your Attack and Defense every time you fall in battle.(10%)

mod.name: Fortify 2
mod.description: Increases your Attack and Defense every time you fall in battle.(20%)

mod.name: Challenger +1
mod.description: Empowers you for a limited time when certain conditions are met.

mod.name: Challenger +2
mod.description: Greatly increases Attack and Affinity when a large monster in the same area becomes angry.

mod.name: Polar Hunter 1
mod.description: Powers you up in the cold. If you drink a Cool Drink...

mod.name: Polar Hunter 2
mod.description: Powers you up in the cold. If you drink a Cool Drink...

mod.name: Polar Hunter 3
mod.description: Powers you up in the cold. If you drink a Cool Drink...

mod.name: Tropic Hunter
mod.description: Powers you up in the heat. If you drink a Hot Drink...

mod.name: Resuscitate
mod.description: Increases Attack when you are suffering from abnormal status.

mod.name: Furor
mod.description: Increases Attack when your Health Gauge is in the red.

mod.name: Repeat Offender
mod.description: Increases Affinity following repeated attacks.

mod.name: Weakness Exploit
mod.description: Increases Affinity when striking body parts your attacks are highly effective against.

mod.name: Critical Eye +1
mod.description: Increases Affinity by 10%.

mod.name: Critical Eye +2
mod.description: Increases Affinity by 20%.

mod.name: Critical Eye +3
mod.description: Increases Affinity by 30%.

mod.name: Elemental Atk Up
mod.description: Increases the power of elemental attacks.

mod.name: Critical Boost
mod.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

mod.name: Crit Element
mod.description: Increases elemental damage (Fire, Water, Thunder, Ice, Dragon) of your critical hits.

mod.name: Bludgeoner
mod.description: Increases Attack based on how low the Sharpness of your weapon is.
